title: The Ancient Peruvian
creator_credit: James Sage, Julien Bryan and International Film Foundation
brief_description: Explores the art, architecture, religions and society of pre-Columbian culture in Peru. Live footage intercut with animation portrays the rise and fall of these vanished people, and contrasts ancient and contemporary Peru. Music incorporates pre-Columbian harmonies based on scales obtained from tuning clay and reed flutes. Suitable for upper primary levels.
